Invocation Name: pet buddy
Developer Terms of Use
des:
PET BUDDY, the pet companion skill, features several different modes to help you look after your pet and keep it company. 

RELAXING MODE: relaxing music and sounds especially selected for your type of pet
DAYCARE MODE : a varied selection of Pet Buddy content to keep your pet company whilst you are busy
SOUND THERAPY MODE: introduce your pet to sounds they may be afraid of to reduce their fear 
ACTIVITY MODE: have some fun with your pet
COMPANION MODE [Premium]: household sounds to keep your pet company whilst you are out

CUSTOMIZED TO YOUR PET
On first use you will be asked a few questions, then the content will be tailored towards your pet(s). 
Say "Alexa, update pets" if you need to change anything later.

Suitable for Dogs, Cats, Birds or any type of pet!

Say "Alexa, Stop" when you want to stop Pet Buddy.

PREMIUM VERSION
Allows you to treat your pet to:
+ Enhanced sound quality
+ Longer loops to increase the variety
+ Unlocks COMPANION MODE which keeps your pet company with realistic sounds of household activity
